entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Corner Brook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:41 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Corner Brook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 09:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: NE 19 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon except plus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to freezing rain or rain near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon except plus 3 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain ending before morning then cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
